issue.title: [Python] Address docstrings in Parquet schema and metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16079](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16079). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a follow-up to https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15428 add example to docstrings for:
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.parquet.read_metadata.html#pyarrow.parquet.read_metadata>
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.parquet.read_schema.html#pyarrow.parquet.read_schema>
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.parquet.write_metadata.html#pyarrow.parquet.write_metadata>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16079?focusedCommentId=17518759) by Alessandro Molina (amol-):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12796
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12796>
